hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Deku Shield#.
